algorithm_technique: Sort elements by value, then assign new values greedily based on row/column constraints.
problem_summary_simple: Replace grid numbers so relative order is kept and max value is minimized.
problem_summary_technical: Sort grid elements, then assign values greedily ensuring row/column constraints are met.
key_insights: The problem requires maintaining relative order, which suggests processing elements in sorted order.
A greedy approach works: assign the smallest possible new value to the smallest original number.
The new value for an element depends on the maximum assigned value in its row and column so far.
